pr_title: Fix "Too long names for API Documentation is not validated in the UI" issue

timeline.message:
Fix issue https://github.com/wso2/product-apim/issues/9103

This commit fixes the above issue only in the UI level by adding
a UI validation to restrict the document name length to 60characters.
